sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"花费"之意。
means: cost ： 指花费时间、金钱、劳力等。其主语是物，而不能由人充当，也不用被动形式。
expend ： 较正式用词，通常指为某一专门目的而花费大量金钱、时间或精力。
spend ： 普通用词，与cost基本同义，但主语必须是人。
take ： 普通用词，指需要占用空间、时间或精力等，其主语可以是人，也可以是一件事情。

sentence.Network_en: Don't expend all your time on such a useless job.
sentence.Network_cn: 不要把时间消耗在这种无用的工作上.

sentence.Network_en: Children expend a lot of energy and may need more high-energy food than adults.
sentence.Network_cn: 孩子们消耗很多能量，可能比成年人需要更多高能量的食物。

sentence.Network_en: If you give up exercise, your muscles shrink and fat increases. By the same token, if you expend more energy you will lose fat.
sentence.Network_cn: 停止锻炼会使肌肉萎缩、脂肪增加。同样，如果花更多的精力锻炼，就会减掉脂肪。

字根字尾构词法.doc - 豆丁网 ... expel 驱逐,逐出 expend 花费,消耗 expense 费用.
开心背单词 - 豆丁网 ... explore： 探索，研究 expend： 花费，支出 pension： 养老金.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin expendere, from ex- 'out' + pendere 'weigh, pay'. Compare with spend

entry.def: To expend something, especially energy, time, or money, means to use it or spend it.

example.ex: Children expend a lot of energy and may need more high-energy food than adults.
example.tran: 孩子们消耗很多能量，可能比成年人需要更多高能量的食物。

sentences.sentence: "The legislature expended its time on school questions"

auth_sentence.content: Many simply do not want to expend the energy.
auth_sentence.res_content: Many simply do not want to expend the energy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Many simply do not want to expend the energy.

auth_sentence.content: Nowhere in health care do we expend more resources.
auth_sentence.res_content: Nowhere in health care do we expend more resources.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Nowhere in health care do we expend more resources.

auth_sentence.content: Considering its great fury the storm took long to expend itself.
auth_sentence.res_content: Considering its great fury the storm took long to expend itself.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Considering its great fury the storm took long to expend itself.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =expend,表示"花费,支付"; 2. 最初意思为"称重量而衡量……",引申出花费,支付; 3. =hang,表示"悬挂"

stems_affixes.word_buile: depend[v.[on]取决于,依靠,信赖,相信]+able可以……的→adj.可依赖的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 依靠的,依赖的,从属的;随…而定的
stems_affixes.word_buile: depend[v.[on]取决于,依靠,信赖,相信]+ent……的→adj.依靠的,依赖的,从属的;随…而定的
im进入+pending即将发生的→adj.即将发生的,逼近的
in不+dependent[adj.依靠的,依赖的,从属的;随…而定的]→不依靠[别的人,事或物]
pend悬挂+ing正……的→悬挂之中→即将发生的
per全部+pend悬挂+ic+ular表形容词→全部挂着的→垂直的
append[v.附加,添加,悬挂]+ix表名词→n.附录,附属物;阑尾,盲肠
pend悬挂+ulum东西→挂着[摆动]的东西→钟摆
per全部+pend悬挂+ic+ular表形容词→全部挂着的→垂直的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 花费, 消耗, 用尽
stems_affixes.word_buile: s+pend花费,支付→v.花费, 消耗, 用尽 v.度过, 消磨
ap加强动作+pend悬挂→挂上去→悬挂
de下+pend悬挂→附属于另一物件
sus在……下面+pend挂→挂在下面→悬挂

means.word_mean: 花费, 使用(钱等)做某事消费,耗费

sentences.en: Don't expend all your time on such a useless job.
sentences.cn: 不要把时间消耗在这种无用的工作上。

sentences.en: The enemy had expended all their ammunition.
sentences.cn: 敌人已耗尽所有的弹药。

jushi.english: He expended all his strength in trying to climb out.
jushi.chinese: 他用尽全力,试图爬出来。

jushi.english: The enemy had expended all their ammunition.
jushi.chinese: 敌人已耗尽所有的弹药。

jushi.english: Don't expend all your time on such a useless job.
jushi.chinese: 不要把时间消耗在这种无用的工作上。
